content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Software Audit is conducted to detect software on users’ workstations and notify them about results of audit in case unauthorized software is detected. Notifications contain a request to delete detected software (with a detailed description of recognized files related to the software) from the workstation with possible consequences of non-compliance with the request.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-error\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rUpon receiving the notification, please uninstall the mentioned software ASAP and follow up in Unauthorized Software Manager.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rPlease refer to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMSAM/FAQ\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"FAQ \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"in case of issues.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://questionnaires.epam.com/survey0330\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rUnauthorized Software Manager (USM) \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"— the tool, which is used to collect records about unauthorized installations, send notifications, comments from end users.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Here, on a \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://questionnaires.epam.com/survey0330\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"User’s page\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", one can view and set the status of unauthorized software, found on a workstation.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There are several tabs on USM user’s page. USM user can see the tabs s/he has permissions to view according to the roles (Project / Resource/ Account Manager, Office director).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Resource managers can see the data related to their team members.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rProject manager and account manager will see the data on unauthorized software found at the project members’ workstations.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
